summary: THE SENSOR/GAS LEVEL IN THE GAS TANK WENT OUT WHEN THE CAR HAD 53000 + OR - ON IT AND IT COST US $300 TO FIX IT.  THE DRIVER'S DOOR DOESN'T SEAL.  AND NOW, AS WE LEFT A STORE TONIGHT, THE FLASHING (YES FLASHING) CHECK ENGINE LIGHT CAME ON AGAIN AND THE CAR IS SPUTTERING AND CLANGING FROM UNDER THE BONNET.  IT IS IN THE EVENING AND A FRIDAY NIGHT.  I OPENED THE HOOD AND IT SMELLED FUNKY/BURNT.  IT WAS SPUTTERING.  THE CAR CURRENTLY HAS 72000 MILES ON IT.  I'LL TRY TO GET IT LOOKED AT IN THE MORROW.
